trends: There has been one other sighting in Neosho
There were no other sightings in Neosho on or around May 29th 2010
divs: Sighting Detailsok,we were at the local taco bell when we seen the object, we thought it was just a helicopter. So we wen't on, i looked out the back window of the car and it was following us, we lost it behind a grove of trees. It became visible again on our right, we pulled in the drive got out to listen for it. But we herd nothing, it hovered above our neighbors house then began heading west when it just, dissapeared. The object was just like a very bright white beam and the object was circular. I was stunned I myself am a U.F.O Hunter.
Summary: Was one bright white light and it followed us home. I got out to listen but heard nothing it dissapeared.
